rows.label: qst201706_msg0001
rows.name: Newt, reporting in!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0002
rows.name:
We successfully cleared out
the Ship-Eating Taos from
the Divine Beast warship!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0003
rows.name:
...You're safe. Thank
you for your effort.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0004
rows.name: Hah, no problem, Grand Marshal!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0005
rows.name:
However, understand that if you were a
soldier, acting without orders as you
did would absolutely not be tolerated.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0006
rows.name:
See that this kind of mess
does not happen again.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0007
rows.name: Uh, sir, yes sir!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0008
rows.name:
Thank you for your
lenience, Grand Marshal.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0009
rows.name:
Well, your friend here did help
us with those Ship-Eating Taos.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0010
rows.name: Allow me to express my thanks.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0011
rows.name:
I remember the days when
the military was full of
firecrackers like her!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0012
rows.name:
Of course, there were problems, but at
least they had a little vim and vigor!
That's who you want at your side, eh?

rows.label: qst201706_msg0013
rows.name:
I fear the army has grown
a little staid in its old
age, as must we all.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0014
rows.name: As you say, Grand Marshal.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0015
rows.name:
That reminds me. Newt, could I
trouble you for a further favor?

rows.label: qst201706_msg0016
rows.name: Yessir! All you have to do is ask, sir!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0017
rows.name:
I must go and inform His
Majesty the Emperor about
your accomplishment.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0018
rows.name:
Since it was, after all, YOUR
accomplishment, I would be delighted
if you met us at the palace.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0019
rows.name: R-really?

rows.label: qst201706_msg0020
rows.name:
Meeting the Emperor...
I-I'm not really sure I-

rows.label: qst201706_msg0021
rows.name:
Just accept, Newt. This
is a great honor.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0022
rows.name: Thank you very much!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0023
rows.name: I'm rather curious to see what happens.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0024
rows.name:
Newt loves the Superbian Army
so much. Do you think she'll cry
when she meets the Emperor?

rows.label: qst201706_msg0025
rows.name:
Perhaps this is a good opportunity
for Newt to learn an imperial
soldier's manners and courtesy.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0026
rows.name:
Well, it seems the Meleph-dono
has no objection.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0027
rows.name:
So it's decided. Newt, you will
make the report about your triumph
over the Ship-Eating Taos.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0028
rows.name: Yessir! Leave it to me sir!
